entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
